snippet: Dutch and Australian police officers on Friday were finally able to fan out over the Malaysia Airlines Flight 17 crash site and to search for human remains overlooked by local workers.
abstract: Dutch and Australian police officers are finally able to spread out over Malaysia Airlines Flight 17 crash site in Ukraine; aim of long-delayed joint operation is to salvage all human remains overlooked by local emergency workers and return them to appropriate families.

byline.contributor: Julie Hirschfeld Davis contributed reporting from Washington, and Neil MacFarquhar from Moscow.

lead_paragraph: Dutch and Australian police officers on Friday were finally able to fan out over the Malaysia Airlines Flight 17 crash site and to search for human remains overlooked by local workers.

headline.main: Investigators in Ukraine Begin Long-Delayed Search of Plane Crash Site
headline.print_headline: Investigators in Ukraine Begin Long-Delayed Search of Plane Crash Site
